Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: In occupational therapy, when we are presented with specific case studies, our teachers arenâ€™t allowed to give us specific feedback at any time and all feedback is generalised. Chat GPT gives me case study feedback to let me know what interventions would be useful and if my intervention would be useful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I enjoy getting feedback from teachers more because I like talking to teachers, engaging in the content and understanding in real time how I am going

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: My teacher is much more accurate and specific to our content
